DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objectives : To evaluate safety tolerability escalate single multiple dos Ibuprofenamine Hydrochloride spray administer topical application . Secondary Objectives : To characterize single multiple pharmacokinetics escalate dos Ibuprofenamine Hydrochloride spray active metabolite ibuprofen topical application .
